amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section to the end of the resolution to amend language in H.R. 2.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds a new section to the end of the resolution to amend language in H.R. 2.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 190 (Roll no. 206).

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) and the resolution. Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215-211
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Roy.
